> The circuit in Figure P11–34 is in the steady state with v1(t) = 5 cos 1414.21t V. Find v2_SS(t). Repeat for v1(t) = 5cos 1 kt V. 
> And without doing any calculations, repeat for v_1(t) = 5 V.


Vi har: 

$$ 
v_{1ss}(t) = 5 \cos(1414.21t)
$$

Dette giver:
$$
v_A = 5 \quad \omega = 1414.21
$$

Transfer funktionen der påvirker systemet:

$$ 
T_v(s) = \frac{Ls+\frac{1}{Cs}}{R+Ls+\frac{1}{Cs}}
$$

Med værdier: 

$$ 
T_v(s) = \frac{25\;\mathrm{mH}s+\frac{1}{20\;\mathrm{µF}s}}{100\;\mathrm{\Omega}+25\;\mathrm{mH}s+\frac{1}{20\;\mathrm{µF}s}} = \frac{s^2+2\cdot10^6}{s^2+4\cdot10^3s+2\cdot10^6}
$$

Omskrivning til frekvensdomænet:

$$ 
T_v(\omega j)  = \frac{\omega j^2+2\cdot10^6}{\omega j^2+4\cdot10^3\omega j+2\cdot10^6}
$$

Amplitude og fase: 
$$
|T_v(s)|= \frac{|\omega^2-2\cdot10^6|}{\sqrt{\omega^4+12\cdot 10^6 \omega^2+4\cdot10^{12} }}
$$

$$
\angle T_v(s) = \arctan\left( \frac{4000\omega}{\omega^2-2\cdot 10^6} \right)
$$

Derfor kan følgende opskrives:

$$
v_{2ss}= v_A |T_v(\omega j)|\cos(\omega t + \phi + \angle{T(j\omega)})\; \mathrm{V}
$$

Altså: 
$$
v_{2ss}= 5 \cdot |T_v(\omega j)| \cdot \cos(1414.21 t + \angle{T(j\omega)})\; \mathrm{V}
$$

Med $\omega = 1414.21$
$$
|T_v(s)| = 1.781\cdot 10^{-6} \quad \angle T_v(s) = -90
$$
$$
v_{2ss}= 5\cdot 1.781\cdot 10^{-6} \cdot \cos(1414.21 t -90) = 8.91\cos(1414.21-90)\; \mathrm{µV}
$$

Med $\omega = 1000$
$$
|T_v(s)| = 242.5\cdot 10^{-3} \quad \angle T_v(s) = -76.96
$$
$$
v_{2ss}= 5\cdot 242.5\cdot 10^{-3} \cdot \cos(1000 t -76.96) = 1.213\cos(1000-76.96)\; \mathrm{µV}
$$
